origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'RiskManagementAPI.get_best_practices', 'description': 'This function retrieves the best risk management practices for a given industry.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry sector for which to retrieve best practices, e.g., technology, finance, healthcare.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'bestPractices', 'description': 'A list of the best risk management practices for the industry.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 RiskManagementAPI.get_best_practices, 它的参数输入如下: 'industry'是'technology'.
